texts.en:
Esther is 27 years old. She is married with two children who are currently in school. Esther trades in tomatoes, yams, onions, beans, maize, dried fish etc. on tabletop in the local market. 

She is convinced that her business can grow better with increased capital and therefore wants the loan to buy more yams, baskets of tomatoes, onions, bags of maize and beans to increased her stock and increase her income. Her goal is to put up a decent shelter.

loans.use: To purchase foodstuff in bulk

loans.name: The Way Forward Group

texts.en:
The above group of entrepreneurs calls their group 'The Way Forward'. They are small-scale businesspeople in the small town of Waterloo, located near Freetown. These people have been in business for many years but their businesses have been growing at a very slow pace due to lack of sufficient working capital. As such, they formed themselves into a group of three to apply for a loan of SLL 1,500,000 from SMT, a partner of 'Shine on Sierra Leone' in Waterloo.

The leader of this group is Aminata S. in the middle of the photo. Aminata was born in Kambia, north of Sierra Leone about forty-five years ago. She is married to a businessman in Waterloo and they have one child who is already a grown-up. Since 1980, Aminata S. has been selling used clothes for adults. With her share of this loan, she will buy a bale of used clothes to add to her business. A bale usually costs about SLL 550,000 in Freetown.

loans.use: Buy a bale of used clothes to add to her business

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La señora MARIA ELENA CHEVEZ L. tiene 44 años, vive en el distrito de EL PORVENIR, provincia de Trujillo, departamento de La Libertad – Perú. Pertenece al Banco Comunal ESPERANZA DEL MAÑANA. La socia presenta estudios secundarios completos, es conviviente y tiene 1 hija quien depende económicamente de ella porque se encuentra en edad escolar. 
Maria se dedica a atender la bodega que tiene en su casa y con su primer crédito de 300.00 nuevos soles comprò productos alimenticios como: arroz, jugos, golosinas, verduras, aceite, menestras, cerveza, etc.  para surtir su tienda.
Actualmente solicitirà un crédito de 2,000.00 nuevos soles con los que comprarà productos alimentitos para su bodega como: arroz, menestras, aceite, fideos, leche, etc. 
Maria sueña con surtir su tienda y de esa manera abastecer a sus clientes y obtener mayores ganancias, ya que necesita ir ahorrando para los estudios superiores de su hija.
texts.en:
MARIA ELENA CHEVEZ L., 44, lives in the EL PORVENIR district, Trujillo province, La Libertad department, Perú. She is a member of the ESPERANZA DEL MAÑANA communal bank. She finished secondary school, lives with her life partner, and has one, school-age, daughter who depends on her economically. Maria runs a small grocery store in her home. She used her first, 300 new sol, loan to buy food items like: rice, juices, sweets, vegetables, oil, root vegetables, beer, etc. to stock her store. Currently, she needs 2000 new soles to buy food items like: rice, vegetables, oil, pasta, milk, etc. Maria dreams with a well-stocked store to take care of her customers and gain higher profits because she needs to start saving in order to be able to afford to pay for her daughter's higher education.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy rice, vegetables, oil, pasta, etc.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is 38 years old and married with two children. She is really dedicated to her work and supportive to her family. She owns and operates a clothing and jewelry shop in the local market. She believes she can make her business grow bigger and brighter with loan support. She wants to use the loan to buy more clothing materials and assorted cosmetics to increase her stock of goods. 

Martha hopes to raise more income this season to support her family.

loans.use: To purchase jewelry in bulk

loans.name: Juana Paula

texts.es:
La señora JUANA, pertenece al Banco Comunal “HUAYNA CCAPAC” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco del Departamento del Cusco. La socia tiene 47 años es madre soltera y tiene un hijo que se llama Alexander. 

Su carácter y su anhelo de cumplir sus sueños, le motivó abrir hace varios años su propia ferretería, cuyas ganancias aporta al ingreso económico en su hogar. Ya son varios años en el negocio y le ha ido muy bien gracias a todo el empeño que pone en su trabajo. Nuestra socia es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia a pesar de las adversidades. La socia requiere el préstamo para adquirir más artículos para la ferretería comprará clavos, pernos, pintura, etc.  

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. En la foto la socia esta acompañada de su hijo Alexander.
texts.en:
Ms. JUANA belongs to the Asociación Arariwa’ s communal bank “HUAYNA CCAPAC” ,in the Province of Cusco, Department of Cusco. The member is 47 years old, is a single mother and has a son named Alexander.

Her character and desire to fulfill her dreams motivated her to open her own hardware store a few years ago. The earnings from the store contribute to her household income. She has now been in business several years and things have gone very well thanks to all the effort she puts into her work. Our member is a hard-working and enterprising mother who supports her family in spite of adversity. The member is requesting a loan to obtain more products for the hardware store. She will buy nails, bolts, paint, etc.

The member is grateful for the opportunity provided by this resource and she promises to make her scheduled payments. In the photo, the member is accompanied by her son Alexander.

Translated from Spanish by Lauren Jackson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to obtain more products for the hardware store, she will buy nails, bolts, paint, etc

loans.name: Guiselle

texts.es:
Guiselle C. C., tiene la edad de 39 años, es casada, y tiene 2 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Ella quiere comprar mas materiales hidroponías para producir mas lechuga de una mejor calidad además de tener mas producto para ofrecer. Ella tiene varios locales donde producir lechuga para vender entre los vecinos y así poder ir creciendo. Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR  y en el pasado, ella no pudo obtener crédito por que hubo demasiado requisitos en los bancos formales. Ella  tiene el deseo a poder hacer que el proyecto crezca y tener un mejor ingreso para mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia y que sus hijos sigan estudiando. 
About FUDECOSUR:
The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Guiselle C. C. is 39, married, and has two children. They are her greatest priority. She wants to buy more hydroponic materials to produce more lettuce of a better quality. Also, she wants to have more products to sell. She has several locations where she grows lettuce to sell to the neighbors. That way she is able to keep growing. She has devoted herself to the farm for many years, and she wants to grow. This is her first loan from FUDECOSUR. In the past she was not able to get a loan because there were too many requirements in the formal banks. She wishes to be able to make the project grow and have better income. She wants this in order to improve her family’s standard of living and so that her children can keep going to school. About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy hydroponic materials to grow lettuce

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
La señorita Virginia es socia del Banco Comunal “Gran Poder” desde hace 3 años atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 23 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos. Estudió secundaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes.
Virginia nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela R. que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar harina, azúcar, arroz, leche, fideos, etc.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa propia e instalar ahí su tienda de abarrotes.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y la puntualidad de las socias en las reuniones.
texts.en:
Miss Virginia has been a member of the “Great Power” Community Bank for the past three years. She is from the Llave district, in the El Collao province, in the department of Puno. She is 23 years old, is single and doesn’t have any children. She has completed secondary school. She buys and sells groceries. Virginia told us that with her first loan from the “Manuela R.” Movement, which was for 300.00 new soles, she was able to increase her working capital. She is asking for a loan of 1,200.00 new soles with which she will buy flour, sugar, rice, milk, noodles, etc. Her dream for the future is to have her own house. In this house she will be able to have her grocery store. What she likes most about the community bank is the savings and that the members arrive at the meetings on time.

Translated from Spanish by Esther Levandoski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: She will buy flour, sugar, rice, milk, noodles.

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es:
La señora Nieves es socia del Banco Comunal “Lupakas” desde hace 1 año atrás, del distrito de Pilcuyo, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 35 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Estudió secundaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado.
Nieves nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital y comprar ovejas.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar una vaca.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa en Ilave y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y la puntualidad que hay con las socias.
texts.en:
Nieves, 35, has been a member of the "Lupakas" communal bank in Pilcuyo district, El Collao province, Puno department, for a year. She is married and has two children. She completed secondary school and she raises cattle. Nieves tells us that she used her first, 500 new sol, loan from Manuela Ramos Movement to buy sheep. She now needs 1700 new soles to buy a cow. Her future dream is to have her home in Ilave and that her children become professionals. What she likes best about her communal bank is the savings and the punctuality of her fellow members.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a cow.

loans.name: Mamuna

texts.en: Mamuna is fifty years old married with four children. Mamuna has been trading in roasted groundnuts and macroni. She obtains her supplies from the northern communities in Ghana. She wants to use the loan to buy bulk stock of ground nuts and macroni to meet the daily demands of her customers. She hopes to use part of her profit to pay her children’s educational fees.

loans.use: To purchase stock in bulk.

loans.name: Sarita Colonia Group

texts.es:
LA SRA.ISIDORA A. S., TIENE 47 AÑOS DE EDAD,ES CASADA Y TIENE DOS HIJOS, QUE SON SU RAZÓN DE TODO SACRIFICIO Y ESFUERZO. ELLA INTEGRA HACE 4 AÑOS,EL GRUPO "SARITA COLONIA",DONDE DESEMPEÑA EL CARGO DE PRESIDENTA.
LA SRA. ISIDORA,HACE DIEZ AÑOS SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE ABARROTES, EN UN ESPACIO DE SU CASA, DONDE ADMINISTRA SU BODEGA. ELLA INICIÓ CON LA VENTA DE CERVEZAS Y GASEOSAS, DONDE LAAPOYÓ SU ESPOSO YA QUE EL CAPITAL INICIAL FUÉ TOMADO DE UNA PARTE DE SU SUELDO.
CON EL TRABAJO EN SU BODEGA , HA PODIDO APOYAR ECONÓMICAMENTE A SU HIJO EN SUS ESTUDIOS SUPERIORES, EMPEZÓ A CONSTRUIR SU CASITA Y COMPRÓ OTRO TERRENO.
ELPRESTAMO SOLICITADO LO UTILIZARÁ PARA INVERTIR EN SU MERCADERÍA PARA SU NEGOCIO.
texts.en:
Isidora A. S. is 47, married and has two children, who are the reason for all her efforts and sacrifice. She is the president of the "Sarita Colonia" Group, of which she has been a member for the past four years. For ten years she has been selling groceries from a grocery store in her house. She started out selling beer and sodas with the support of her husband, who used part of his salary as start-up capital. Income from the grocery store has allowed Isidora to support her son's higher education, start building her house, and buy another lot. She plans to invest this loan in merchandise for her store.

Translated from Spanish by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To invest in her grocery store

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is fifty years old. He is married with two children who are in school. He sells used clothes and has many customers.  However, with limited capital he can not provide much variety.  He wants a loan to buy more bales of used clothes and increase his selection to meet the desires of his customers and expand his income for his family.

loans.use: To purchase bales of used clothes

loans.name: Sapah Group

texts.en:
Here are members of the 'Sapah' group in the small town of Waterloo, near Freetown. This group of entrepreneurs are seeking a loan of SLL 2,900,000 to enable them to expand their businesses.

The leader of this group of borrowers is Hawanatu T. on the right. Hawanatu was born in Lunsar, in northern Sierra Leone. She is twenty-four years of age, single, with one child who is in class one.

Hawanatu sells cottons, lace, and school uniforms. She has been doing this business for over four years now. With this loan, Hawanatu will buy five packets of lace and six lengths of cotton cloth. A packet of lace costs something between SLL 80,000 – 100,000 and a length of cotton costs something between SLL 50,000 – 60,000.

loans.use: Buy five packets of lace and six lengths of cotton cloth

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 37 years old and operates a "boda boda" (motorcycle taxi) business. Through his previous KES 40,000 loan, he was able to buy a motorbike and expand stock for his retail shop, which is his other source of income. With this KES 80,000 loan, he plans to expand his business and open another shop. Joseph is widowed and has a 9-year-old daughter named Mary, who attends school. He describes himself as hardworking and focused.

loans.use: To expand his retail and taxi business

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Francisca es socia del Banco Comunal “Lupakas” desde hace 4 años atrás, del distrito de Pilcuyo, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 50 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Estudió primaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa.
Francisca nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar ropa.
Su sueño para el futuro es aumentar su negocio y vivir con más comodidad.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y la puntualidad de las socias.
texts.en:
Francisca has been a member of the “Lupakas” communal bank for four years. She lives in the district of Pilcuyo in the province of El Collao, department of Puno. Francisca is 50 years old, married, and has 2 children. She completed her primary school education and makes a living selling clothing. Francisca tells us that the first loan she requested from the Manuela Ramos organization was for 500.00 soles, and she used it to increase her capital. She is now asking for a loan of 1,500.00 soles, which she will use to purchase clothing. Francisca’s dream for the future is to increase her business and to live more comfortably. Her favorite things about her communal bank are the savings and the punctuality of the other members.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing clothing

loans.name: Etelvida

texts.es:
Etelvida, tiene la edad de 44 años, es divorciada, y no tiene hijos. Ella tiene un local donde cuenta con abarrotes para los vecinos el cual cuenta una ubicación centrica.  Ella quiere comprar mas mercadería para brindar una mayor variedad de artículos para los clientes.  Tiene varios años que se dedica a su negocio y quiere crecer. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR  y en el pasado, ella no pudo obtener crédito por que hubo demasiado requisitos con otros bancos formales. Ella  tiene el deseo a por medio de aumentar la cantidad de artículos y tener un mejor ingreso economico, así mejorar el local y su nivel de vida. 
About FUDECOSUR:
The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Etelvida is 44, divorced, and does not have children. She has a place where she sells groceries to the neighbors. The place is centrally located. She wants to buy more merchandise to offer a greater variety of articles to her customers. She has been in this business for several years, and she wants to grow. This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR. In the past she could not get a loan because there were too many requirements with the other, formal banks. She wants to increase the quantity of articles by half and have a better income. That way she will improve her location and her standard of living. About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Celestina

texts.es:
La señorita Celestina es socia del Banco Comunal “Lupakas” desde hace 3 años atrás, del distrito de Pilcuyo, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos. Es estudiante y se dedica a la venta de sogas e instrumentos.
Celestina nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos, que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar hilos, lana, nylon, guitarra, charango.
Su sueño para el futuro es seguir cantando y terminar de estudiar.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
. Celestina, 20, has been a member of the "Lupakas" communal bank in Pilcuyo district, El Collao province, Puno department for 3 years. She is single and has no children. She is a student and she sells ropes (cords) and musical instruments. Celestina tells us that her first, 300 new sol, loan from Manuela Ramos Movement was used to increase her working capital. She now is requesting 1000 new soles to buy threads, wool, nylon, guitar and charango (small South American guitar, often made from armadillo shell). Her dream for the future is to continue singing and to finish her schooling. What she likes best about her communal bank is the get-togethers with her fellow members.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy wool, nylon, guitar and charango (small South American guitar, often made from armadillo shell)

loans.name: Celestina

texts.es:
La señora Celestina es socia del Banco Comunal “Lupakas” desD. hace 4 años atrás, del distrito D. Pilcuyo, provincia D. El Collao, departamento D. Puno. Ella tiene 59 años D. edad, es viuda y tiene 2 hijos. Estudió secundaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta D. ganado y sogas.
Celestina nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo comprar materiales para la elaboración D. sogas.
Ella solicitará un crédito D. S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar una vaca.
Su sueño para el futuro es comprarse un terreno en Puno y ahí construir su casa, para posteriormente abrir una tienda D. ropa.
Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal es el ahorro.
texts.en:
Sra. Celestina has been a member of the Communal Bank “Lupakas” for the past four years. She lives in the District of Pilcuyo, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. Celestina is 59 years old and a widow with two children. She completed her high school education. Her businesses incluD. trading livestock and selling rope.

Celestina tell us that the first loan she requested from Manuela Ramos was in the amount of 300 soles and used to buy materials for making rope. She is now seeking a loan of 2500 soles so that she can buy a cow.

Her dream for the future is to purchase land in Puno so that she can build a house. After that, she wants to open a clothing store. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank is the savings account.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a cow

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
La señora JUSTINA, pertenece al Banco Comunal “HUAYNA CCAPAC” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco del Departamento del Cusco. La socia tiene 68 años es madre soltera y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Su carácter y su anhelo de cumplir sus sueños, le motivó abrir hace varios años su propio negocio de venta de empanadas en el colegio “Arturo Palomino”, cuyas ganancias aporta al ingreso económico en su hogar. La socia de lunes a viernes esta en el negocio de las empanadas y los fines de semana en la plaza “Tupac Amaru” del distrito de Wanchaq vende accesorios de herramientas de jardinería. Ya son varios años en el negocio y le ha ido muy bien gracias a todo el empeño que pone en su trabajo. Nuestra socia es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia a pesar de las adversidades. La socia requiere el préstamo para adquirir más herramientas como palas, picos y tijeras.  

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
JUSTINA, 68, is a member of Asociación Arariwa's “HUAYNA CCAPAC” communal bank which is located in Cusco province, Cusco department. She is a single mother of 4 children. Her wish to see her dreams come true and her way of being motivated her to open her own business several years ago; she sells empanadas (turnovers) at the "Arturo Palomino" school. The earnings from these sales go to her household expenses. She sells the empanadas from Monday through Friday and on weekends sells gardening tools in “Tupac Amaru” plaza in Wanchaqu district. She has been in this line of work for several years, too and has done well, thanks to the efforts she puts into it. She is a hard-working, enterprising woman who sees to it that her family gets ahead in life despite all adversities. She needs funding to buy more gardening tools like shovels, pickaxes and shears. She is grateful for the opportunity granted by this means and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy gardening tools.

loans.name: Honestidad,progreso Y Lealtad (Honesty, Progress And Loyalty) Group

texts.es:
RAQUEL MYRIAM M. P., TIENE 48 AÑOS DE EDAD, TIENE 3 HIJOS, ELLA INTEGRA HACE CINCO AÑOS EL GRUPO "HONESTIDAD,PROGRESO Y LEALTAD" JUNTO A 9 INTEGRANTES MAS.
LA SRA. RAQUEL SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE CALZADO, PARA LO CUAL VIAJE QUINCENALMENTE AL NORTE DEL PAÍS.
ELLA INICIÓ GRACIAS A LA INVITACIÓN DE UNA AMIGA QUIEN LA ANIMÓ A VIAJAR Y A INVERTIR EN ÉSTE RUBRO,AL VER QUE PUDO COLOCAR SU MERCADERÍA RAPIDAMENTE ENTRE FAMILIARES Y AMIGOS.
GRACIAS A ÉSTE NEGOCIO, ELLA HA PODIDO DAR EDUCACIÓN A SUS HIJOS Y PAGAR LAPREPARACIÓN PRE UNIVERSITARIA DE UNO DE SUS HIJOS Y ADEMÁS COMPRARSE UNA CASA.
CON ELPRÉSTAMO SOLICITADO COMPRARÁ CALZADO PARA CUMPLIR CON LOS PEDIDOS DE LA CAMPAÑA NAVIDEÑA.
texts.en:
Raquel Myriam M. P. is 48 years old and has 3 children. For the past five years, she has been a member of the "HONESTIDAD,PROGRESO Y LEALTAD" (Honesty, Progress and Loyalty) group, together with 9 other members. Raquel's business is selling shoes, for which she travels every two weeks to the northern part of the country. She began thanks to an invitation from a friend, which inspired her to travel and invest in this business, seeing that she could quickly place her merchandise among family members and friends. Thanks to this business, she has been able to provide an education to her children, pay for pre-university training for one of them, and also purchase a house. With the loan she is requesting, she will buy shoes to fulfill her Christmas orders.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Investing in merchandise for her business

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La señora Teresa es socia del Banco Comunal “San Juan” desde hace 4 meses atrás (reingresante), del distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 32 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos. Estudiò primaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de animales.
Teresa nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo incrementar su capital y asi comprar ovejas y chanchos.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1000.00 con el que podrá comprar una ternera.
Su sueño para el futuro es comprar un carro y tener su negocio independiente.
Lo que màs le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el préstamo y los ahorros.
texts.en:
Teresa, 32, has been a member of the "San Juan" communal bank in the Yunguyo district and province, Puno department, for 4 months (returning member). She is married and has 3 children. She finished elementary school and she raises small farm animals. Teresa tells us that she used her first Manuela Ramos Movement, 300 new sol, loan to buy sheep and pigs. She now requests 1000 new soles to buy a calf. Her dream for the future is to buy a car and have her own independent business. What she likes best about her communal bank is the loans and the savings.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a calf.

loans.name: Nora Amelia

texts.es:
La señora Nora es socia del Banco Comunal “Gregoria Apaza” desde hace 4 años atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 27 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Estudió secundaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado.
Nora nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital y comprar una oveja y un chancho.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar una vaca.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa propia en Ilave y que sus hijos sean profesionales. 
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y las reuniones con las socias
texts.en:
Nora, 27, has been a member of the "Gregoria Apaza" communal bank in Ilave district, El Collao province, Puno department, for 4 years now. She is married and has two children. She finished secondary school and she raises cattle. Nora tells us that she used her first Manuela Ramos Movement, 300 new sol, loan to buy a sheep and a pig. She now needs 1500 new soles to buy a cow. Her dream for the future is to have her own home in Ilave and that her children become professionals. What she likes best about her communal bank is the savings and the get-togethers with her fellow members.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a cow.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
La señora Josefa es socia del Banco Comunal “Gregoria Apaza” recientemente, del distrito D. Ilave, provincia D. El Collao, departamento D. Puno. Ella tiene 49 años D. edad, es casada y tiene 6 hijos, D. los cuales 3 viven con ella. Estudió primaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta D. ganado.
Josefa nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo que solicitará al Movimiento Manuela Ramos D. S/. 500.00 nuevos soles comprarà ovejas.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa propia en Ilave.
Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal son las facilidades D. préstamo.
texts.en:
Josepha recently became a member of the “Gregoria Apaza” communal bank, located in the district of Ilave in the province of El Collao, department of Puno. She is 49 years old, married, and has 6 children, 3 of them still living with her. She completed her primary school education and makes a living buying and selling livestock. Josepha tells us that she is requesting her first loan from the Manuela Ramos organization; it is for 500.00 soles, and she will use it to purchase sheep. Her dream for the future is to have her own home in Ilave. Her favorite thing about her communal bank is the terms of the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing sheep

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La señora Graciela es socia del Banco Comunal “Gran Poder” desde hace 5 años atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 33 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Estudió superior incompleta y tiene su panaderìa.
Graciela nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, con el que podrá comprar harina, azúcar, etc.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa propia e instalar ahí su horno.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y la puntualidad de las socias en las reuniones.
texts.en:
Graciela, 33, has been a member of the "Gran Poder" communal bank in Ilave district, El Collao province, Puno department, for 5 years now. She is married and has 2 children. She didn't finish higher education and she has a bakery. Graciela tells us that she used her first, 300 new sol, loan from the Manuela Ramos Movement to increase her working capital. She now is requesting a 500 new sol loan to buy flour, sugar, etc. Her dream for the future is to have her own home and to install her oven there. What she likes best about her communal bank is the savings and the punctuality of her fellow members at the meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy American and local rice, Magui soups, tuna, sugar, flour, oil, La Lechera milk, Nido milk, light bulbs.

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.es:
La señora Maria es socia del Banco Comunal “Gran Poder” desD. hace 9 años atrás, del distrito D. Ilave, provincia D. El Collao, departamento D. Puno. Ella tiene 65 años D. edad, es casada y tiene 6 hijos. Estudió secundaria incompleta y se dedica a la compra y venta D. coca. Paralelamente D. dedica a la elaboraciòn y venta D. pan.
Maria nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito D. S/. 2,300.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar los ingredientes para hacer pan como: harina y azúcar y a la vez para la compra D. coca.
Su sueño para el futuro es vivir tranquila sin preocupaciones.
Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad D. las socias en las reuniones.
texts.en:
María, 65, has been a member of the "Gran Poder" communal bank in Ilave district, El Collao province, Puno department, for 9 years now. She is married and has 6 children. She did not complete secondary school and she is a coca [The dried leaves of a South American shrub (Erythroxylon coca) of the flax family, chewed by the natives as a stimulant] merchant. She also bakes and sells bread. María tells us that she used her first, 300 new sol, loan from the Manuela Ramos Movement to increase her working capital. She now needs 2300 new soles to buy bread-baking ingredients like flour and sugar and, at the same time, to buy coca. Her dream for the future is to live peacefully and worry-free. What she likes best about her communal bank is the punctuality of her fellow members at meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar and coca [The dried leaves of a South American shrub (Erythroxylon coca) of the flax family, chewed by the natives as a stimulant]

loans.name: Oldemar

texts.es:
Oldemar C. S., tiene la edad de 29 años, es casado, y tiene 2 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El quiere comprar un vehiculo de trabajo para tener mas facilidad, estar más puntual en su trabajo y tener mejor establidad laboral. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR y en el pasado, el no pudo obtener crédito por que hubo demasiado requisitos con otros bancos formales. El tiene el deseo a tener una mayor seguridad en el ingreso al hogar y de esta manera poder satisfacer las necesidades de su familia y hacer que puedan estudiar y tener mejor condicion de vida. 
About FUDECOSUR:
The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Oldemar C. Sanches is 29, married, and has two children, who are his top priority. He wants to buy a work vehicle to make things easier, be more punctual in his work, and have more job stability. This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR; he couldn't get a loan in the past because he couldn't meet the requirements of the other formal banks. He wants his income to be more secure so he can satisfy his family's needs, and give them the chance to go to school and have a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a vehicle for work

loans.name: Dianap

texts.es:
La señora DIANA, pertenece al Banco Comunal “HUAYNA CCAPAC” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco del Departamento del Cusco. La socia tiene 25 años es conviviente y tiene dos hijos.  

Nuestra socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la venta de ropa. Su carácter y su anhelo de cumplir sus sueños, le motivó a tener su propio negocio de venta de ropa, cuyas ganancias aporta al ingreso económico en su hogar. La socia viaja a la ciudad de “Desaguadero” en la frontera de Perú y Bolivia y compra mercadería que después distribuye a sus clientes de los mercados del “Baratillo” y “El Altiplano”. La socia de lunes a viernes rellena formularios en la Av. Sol del Banco de la Nación. Ya son varios años con los negocios y le ha ido muy bien gracias a todo el empeño que pone en su trabajo. Nuestra socia es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia a pesar de las adversidades. La socia requiere el préstamo para adquirir más ropa como casacas, faldas, camisas, chompas, blusas, polos y mucho más. 

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Mrs. Diana, belongs to the Huayna CCAPAC Community Bank part of the Arariwa Assocation of the Province of Cusco in the Department of Cusco. She is 25 years old and lives with her husband and two children. She balances her housework with a job selling clothing. Her character and desire to achieve her dreams motivated her to start her own clothing business, which helps her support her family. Diana travels to the the city of Desaguadero on the Peru-Bolivia border and buys merchandise which she later sells to clients in the Baratillo and El Altiplano markets. From Monday to Friday she fills out forms for National Bank (Banco de la Nacion). She has run the business for several years, and she has done well thanks to her hard work. Diana is a hard-working mother and a self-starter who helps her family in the face of adversity. She is seeking the loan to purchase more clothing like jackets, skirts, shirts, polo shirts, and more. Diana is thankful for the opportunity and promises to fulfill her payments on schedule.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick King, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of clothing

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La señora Celia es socia del Banco Comunal “Lupakas” desde hace 2 años atrás, del distrito de Pilcuyo, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 50 años de edad, es casada y tiene 6 hijos. Celia no estudió y se dedica a la venta de sogas.
Celia nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar hilos, lana y nylon.
Su sueño para el futuro es aumentar su negocio de sogas y poder brindarle estudios a su hijo.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
Celia, 50, has been a member of the "Lupakas" communal bank in Pilcuyo district, El Collao province, Puno department, for 2 years now. She is married and has 6 children. Celia never went to school and she sells ropes and cords. Celia tells us that she used her first, 500 new sol, loan from the Manuela Ramos Movement to increase her working capital. She is now requesting 1000 new soles to buy thread, nylon and wool. Her dream for the future is to have her rope and cord business grow so that she can afford schooling costs for her son. What she likes best about her communal bank is the savings and the get-togethers with her fellow members.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy thread, nylon, wool.

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.es:
La señora Feliciana es socia del Banco Comunal “Gran Poder” desde hace 10 años atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 49 años de edad, es casada y tiene 7 hijos de los cuales 3 viven con ella. Estudió primaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de lanas.
Feliciana nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 700.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar lanas de diversos tipos.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa propia en Ilave.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro.
texts.en:
Sra. Feliciana has been a member of the Communal Bank “Gran Poder” (Great Power) for the past 10 years. She lives in the District of Ilave, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. Feliciana is 49 years old, married, and has 7 children of whom 3 still live with her. She completed her elementary school education and engages in buying and selling wool.

Feliciana tells us that the first loan she requested from Manuela Ramos was for 300 soles and used to increase her capital. She is now requesting another loan in the amount of 700 soles so that she can buy different types of wool.

Her dream for the future is to have her own house in Ilave. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank is the savings account.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase wool

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
La señora Maria es socia del Banco Comunal “Gregoria Apaza” desde hace 5 años atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 57 años de edad, es casada y tiene 7 hijos de los cuales 4 viven con ella. Estudió primaria incompleta y se dedica a la compra y venta de animales menores.
Maria nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar una oveja caranegra y un chancho.
Su sueño para el futuro es mejorar su alimentación y vivir feliz y tranquila pues cuenta con todo lo anhelado.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria is a partner in the Community Bank “Gregoira Apaza” for the last five years. She lives in the Ilave district, in the El Collao provence of the Puno area. She is 57 years old, married and has seven children four of which live with her. She finished elementary school studies and lives buying and selling of small animals. Maria tells us of her first loan requested from the Mauela Ramos Movement which was for S/300 Peruvian nuevos soles which she used to increase her capital. She is requesting a loan for S/500 Peruvian nuevos soles with which she will buy a black faced sheep and a pig. Her dream for the future, and all that she longs for, is to improve her nutrition and live happily and peacefully. What she likes best about the Community Bank are the partner meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a black faced sheep and a pig

loans.name: Aurea

texts.es:
La señora AUREA, pertenece al Banco Comunal “HUAYNA CCAPAC” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco del Departamento del Cusco. La socia tiene 45 años es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Nuestra socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la venta de autopartes de carros. Su carácter y su anhelo de cumplir sus sueños, le motivó abrir hace varios años su propio negocio, cuyas ganancias aporta al ingreso económico en su hogar. Ya son varios años con el negocio y le ha ido muy bien gracias a todo el empeño que pone en su trabajo. Nuestra socia es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia a pesar de las adversidades. La socia requiere el préstamo para adquirir más autopartes de carros como focos de faros y silicones. 

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Mrs. Aurea belongs to the community bank of “HUAYNA CCAPAC” of the Arariwa Assoiciation of the provence of Cuzco, of the Department of Cuzco. She is 45 years old and married with two children. This partner alternates her activities in the home with the sale of car auto parts. Her strong character and her longing to complete her dreams, motivated her to open her own business a few years ago. She contributes those earnings to the household expenses. She has been working this business for several years and it has gone well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work. This partner of ours is a working and enterprising mother that moves her family forward despite adversities. This partner is requesting a loan in order to obtain more auto parts such as headlights and silicones. She is pleased about the opportunity before her and at the same time is committed to the corresponding timely repayments required.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: This partner requests the loan to obtain more auto parts such as headlights and silicones.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
La señora Josefa es socia del Banco Comunal “Lupakas” desde hace 3 meses atrás, del distrito de Pilcuyo, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 25 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Estudió primaria incompleta y se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado.
Josefa nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar chanchitos y ovejas.
Su sueño para el futuro es aumentar su negocio y poder brindarle estudios a sus hijos.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
Sra. Josefa has been a member of the Communal Bank “Lupakas” for 3 months. She lives in the District of Pilcuyo, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 25 years old, married, and has 4 children. Josefa was not able to complete her elementary school education, but she now engages in buying and selling livestock.

She tells us that the first loan she requested from Manuela Ramos was for 500 soles and was used to increase her capital. Josefa is now requesting another loan of 500 soles so that she can buy piglets and sheep.

Her dream for the future is to increase her business and be able to provide for her children’s education. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the savings account and the meetings with the other members.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase piglets & sheep

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La señora Gloria es socia del Banco Comunal “Gregoria Apaza” desde hace 4 años atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 39 años de edad, es casada y tiene 5 hijos. Estudió primaria incompleta y se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado.
Gloria nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar una ternera para que produzca leche.
Su sueño para el futuro es comprar su casa en Ilave para sus hijos y vivir tranquila junto a ellos. 
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro.
texts.en:
Sra. Gloria has been a member of the Gregoria Apaza Communal Bank for 4 years. She lives in the District of Ilave, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. Gloria is 39 years old, married, and has 5 children. She did not complete elementary school, but she engages in buying and selling livestock.

Gloria tells us that the first loan she requested from Manuela Ramos was for 300 soles and was used to increase her capital. She is now requesting a loan of 1200 soles so that she can buy a milk-producing cow.

Her dream for the future is to buy a house in Illave for her children and live peacefully with them. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank is the savings account.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Arnold

texts.es:
Arnold, tiene la edad de 21 años, es soltero, y  tiene 1 hijo que es su mayor prioridad. El tiene una finca de 4 hectarias donde cultiva cafe. Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer. El quiere comprar de abone, pago de peones y  asistencia de cafe para que el cafe se prepare bien para la proxima cosecha . Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El tiene el deseo a lograr que coseche mas para aumentar sus ingresos y poder cubrir asi sus necesidades basicas con su madre. 
About FUDECOSUR:
The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Arnold is 21 years old, single and has a son who is his top priority. He has four hectares of country property where he grows coffee. He has been working on this property for several years. He wants to buy fertilizer and pay workers so that the coffee is well prepared for the next harvest. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He hopes to harvest more in order to supplement his income and to be able to cover the costs of basic needs with his mother. About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: supplement the coffee, buy fertilizer and pay workers

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
La señora Rita es socia del Banco Comunal “Gran Poder” desde hace 4 años atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 30 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 1 hijo. Estudió secundaria incompleta y tiene una tienda de abarrotes.
Rita nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar panteones, leche, chocolate y todo lo necesario para la venta en època navideña.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa propia en Ilave y que su hijo sea profesional.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y la puntualidad de las socias en las reuniones.
texts.en:
Señora Rita has been a member of the Banco Comunal "Gran Poder" ( Powerful Community Bank) in the Llave district of El Collao province in the department of Puno for four years. She is 30 years old and a single mother with one child. She did not complete her high school education and she now has a grocery store. Señora Rita says that with her first loan of S/. 300.00 nuevos soles from Movimiento Manuela Ramos she was able to increase her capital. She is now requesting a loan of S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles with which she will be able to buy "panteones" (a Christmas cake), milk, chocolate and other necessities for the festive season. Her dream for the future is to have her own house in Llave and for her child to pursue a professional career. The things she likes most about her Community Bank are the savings and the reliability of the members at the meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Dent, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy milk, chocolate and "panteones"

loans.name: Kaindi

texts.en:
Kaindi is married with two children, who are both attending school. She has a small grocery business in the Embakasi Village area of Nairobi. She has been in this business for six years and has two employees. She also earns some income from a boutique in Kitui. She recently successfully repaid a loan from Faulu for KES 20,000 and is requesting this loan for KES 60,000 to buy more tomatoes, Irish potatoes, and onions. 

She describes herself as hardworking, honest, and brave and says that since she became a member of Faulu her business has grown. Her hope for the future is simply to provide a quality life and education for her family.

loans.use: buy tomatoes, Irish potatoes, and onions

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
La señora Marcelina es socia del Banco Comunal “San Juan”, en el distrito y provincia D. Yunguyo, departamento D. Puno. Ella tiene 60 años D. edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos. Estudiò primaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta D. cereales.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 2 años atrás y su primer préstamo fue D.  S/.500.00 nuevos soles el mismo que le sirvió para la compra D. cañihua, cebada, habas, quinua, etc.
Ella solicitará un préstamo D. S/.1,500.00 nuevos soles con los que comprarà dos toros y harà crecer su negocio.
Su deseo para el futuro es que sus hijos sean profesionales y que cada uno tenga su casa propia.
Lo que màs le gusta D. su organización es el ahorro y las reuniones que hay con las socias.
texts.en:
Marcelina is a member of the community bank San Juan in Yunguyo, Puno. Marcelina is 60 years old, married and has three children. She has an elementary school education and buys and sells cereal grains for a living. Marcelina has been working with the Manuela Ramos movement for two years. She used her first loan to purchase kaniwa, barley, beans, quinoa, etc. This time around, she will use her loan to buy two bulls and expand her business. Her hope for the future is that her children can become professionals and own their own homes. Her favourite aspects of community bank membership are having the chance to build her savings and being able to meet with other members.

Translated from Spanish by Corinne Gilroy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: buying two bulls

loans.name: Dorotea

texts.es:
La señora Dorotea es socia del Banco Comunal “San Juan”, en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, en el departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 33 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Estudiò primaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela R. desde hace 1 año atrás y su primer préstamo fue de S/.500.00 nuevos soles el mismo que le sirvió para la compra de ovejas y gallinas.
Ella solicitará un préstamo de S/.1,500.00 nuevos soles con el comprarà dos toros.
Su deseo para el futuro es que sus hijos sean profesionales y que vivan felices.
Lo que màs le gusta de su organización es el ahorro.
texts.en:
Sra. Dorotea is a member of the San Juan Communal Bank in the District and Province of Yunguyo, Department of Puno. She is 33 years old, married, and has 4 children. Dorotea completed elementary school and engages in buying and selling livestock.

She has been working with Manuela R. for a year. Her first loan of 500 soles was used to buy sheep and chickens. Dorotea is now requesting a loan of 1500 soles to purchase two bulls.

Her dream for the future is to see her children become professionals and live happily. What she enjoys most about the Manuela R. organization is the savings account.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase two bulls

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
La señora Dominga es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Juan”, en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 50 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Dominga no estudió y se dedica a la compra y venta de animales.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 3 años atrás y su primer préstamo fue de  S/.300.00 nuevos soles el mismo que le sirvió para la compra de ovejas, gallinas y porcinos.
Ella solicitará un préstamo de S/.2,000.00 nuevos con los que comprarà una vaca lechera.
Su deseo para el futuro es vivir tranquila sin tantas preocupaciones.
Lo que màs le gusta de su organización es el ahorro y la puntualidad que hay en cada reunión.
texts.en:
Sra. Dominga is a member of the San Juan Communal Bank in the District and Province of Yunguyo, Department of Puno. She is 50 years old, married, and has two children. Dominga did not attend school, but she does engage in buying and selling animals.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for three years. Her first loan was for 300 soles and was used to purchase sheep, chickens, and pigs. Dominga now requests a loan of 2000 soles to buy a dairy cow.

Her desire for the future is to live peacefully with few worries. What she likes most about the Manuela Ramos organization are the savings account and the timeliness of each meeting.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Eduviges

texts.es:
La señora Eduviges es socia del Banco Comunal “Gran Poder” desde hace 5 años atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 34 años de edad, es casada y tiene 1 hijo. Estudió secundaria completa y tiene su tienda de abarrotes.
Eduviges nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela R. que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 900.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar harina, azúcar, arroz, fideos y leche.
Su sueño para el futuro es seguir con su negocio y vivir tranquila.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
Sra. Eduviges has been a member of the Communal Bank “Gran Poder” (Great Power) for 5 years. She lives in the District of Ilave, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. Eduviges is 34 years old, married, and has 1 child. She has a high school education and manages a grocery store.

Eduviges tells us that the first loan she requested from Manuela R. was for 300 soles, which was used to increase her capital. She is now requesting a loan of 900 soles in order to buy flour, sugar, rice, noodles, and milk.

Her dream for the future is continue with her business and live peacefully. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the savings account and the meetings with the other members.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase flour, sugar, rice, noodles, and milk

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es:
La señora Eugenia es socia del Banco Comunal “Gregoria Apaza” desde hace 5 años atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 30 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Estudió secundaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de cereales de la región y paralelamente a la artesanìa.
Eugenia nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar cereales como: chuño, tunta, avena, quinua y a la vez animales menores.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa propia en Ilave, poner una tienda de abarrotes y vivir feliz con su familia. 
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
Ms. Eugenia has been a member of the Communal Bank "Gregoria Apaza" for 5 years, in the district of Ilave, El Collao province, Puno department. She is 30 years old, married and has two children. She completed secondary school studies. She buys and sells local staple foods and she also crafts.

Eugenia tells us that with the first loan she requested from the Movimiento Manuela Ramos (Manuela Ramos Movement), which was of S./300.00, she was able to increase her working capital. She is now requesting a loan of S./500.00 with which she can buy staple foods such as chuño (black dehydrated potato), tunta (white dehidrated potato), oats, quinoa and also small animals. Her dream for the future is to have her own home in Ilave, open up a general store and live happily with her family.

What she likes the most about her Communal Bank is the saving process and the meetings with the other members.

Translated from Spanish by Cecilia Piris, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of chuño, tunta, quinoa, oats

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.en: Ernestina A. sells soft drinks and ice kenkey [a local cornmeal dish] at old post office near Abura.  Ernestina has received senior high education.  She is married and has three children. Her husband is a trader. Ernestina has been selling minerals and ice kenkey since 2003. She supports her family by paying school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to buy kenkey and soft drinks for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to build her personal house.

loans.use: Her loan will be used to buy kenkey and soft drinks for sale.

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
La señora Maruja es socia del Banco Comunal “Niño San Salvador de Conchaca” desde hace 3 meses atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 35 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Estudió superior completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de sogas.
Maruja nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 900.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar hilos, lana, nylon.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa en Ilave y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la facilidad de préstamo y los temas de educación que dan las promotoras.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maruja has been a member of “Niño San Salvador de Conchaca” Community Bank, in the district of Ilave, in the province of El Collao, in the department of Puno, for 3 months. She is 35 years old, is married and has two children. She completed secondary school, and she buys and sells ropes. Maruja used the first loan of 500 PEN that she requested from the Moviment Maunela Ramos to increase her capital. She is requesting a loan of 900 PEN to buy thread, wool and nylon. Her dream for the future is to have a house in Ilave and for her children to be professionals. What she likes most about her Community Bank is the simplicity of the loan and the educational themes that it promotes.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy thread, wool and nylon

loans.name: Jhonny Mario

texts.es:
El Señor Jhonny Peláez tiene 31 años, y está casado y tiene 3 hijos pequeños de los cuales 2 acuden a la escuela y el otro se queda con la mama en la casa. El señor  Jhonny se dedica a brindar servicios de policía de seguridad en un Súper Mercado de La zona Oeste de la Ciudad de Cochabamba, donde según información otorgada por el dueño del súper mercado el señor Jhonny en una persona muy trabajadora, confiable y cumplida con todas las normas de la empresa.

El señor Jhonny  vive en la zona de Cero verde en Cochabamba, en una casa en alquiler. Después de algunos años de ahorrar plata pudo comprarse un lote en la zona de Huallani que es una Zona ubicada en el sector Este de la Ciudad de Cochabamba, pero no les alcanzo la plata para poder construir su casa.
Es por eso que el crédito será utilizado para la construcción de su casa así de este modo podrán mudarse a su casa y no pagar alquileres y poder cumplir su sueño de tener una vivienda propia y un lugar donde sus hijos puedan estar comodos.
texts.en:
Mr. Jhonny P. is 31 years old, married, and has 3 small children, 2 of whom attend school, while 1 remains at home with its mother. Jhonny serves as a security policeman in a super market in the western zone of Cochabamba city. According to the owner of the super market, Jhonny is a very trustworthy, responsible, and hard-working person who complies with all the norms of the enterprise. Jhonny lives in the Cero Verde zone of Cochabamba in a rental house. After several years of saving money he was able to buy a house lot in the Huallani zone, located in the Eastern sector of Cochabamba. But they lacked the funds to be able to construct their house. For this reason the loan will be used to construct a house, enabling them to move and avoid paying rent. This will fulfill their dream of having their own home and a place where their children can feel comfortable.

Translated from Spanish by Harold Sims, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construccion de Vivienda

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary A. is married and has three children. She has received a high school education.  Mary sells porridge at teterem near Elmina, which she has been doing since 2009. Her husband is a trader.  Mary uses her income to help pay school fees and utility bills. Mary will use the loan to purchase more milo, milk and also buy millet for the making of the porridge to sell to her costumers who prefer to take their breakfast at her shop. With the new profits from her expanded business, Mary plans to educate her children.

loans.use: Mary will use the loan to purchase more milo, milk and also buy millet for the making of the porridge to sell

loans.name: Walbina

texts.es:
La Sra. Walbina es cliente antiguo de nuestra empresa, es casada y tiene 2 hijos mayores. Se dedica a la compra-venta de artículos de mercería y ropas en general. Tiene un puesto ubicado sobre Ruta Mcal. Estigarribía esq. Madame Lynch (mejor conocido como calle última).
El negocio se encuentra muy bien ubicado, por forma parte de zona muy concurrida por la gente, y mediante esto el negocio ya cuenta con 30n años de antigüedad con una buena cantidad de clientela.
La misma tiene su casa en la ciudad de Capiata  km 20 desde donde viaja todos los días para atender su negocio. Cuenta con casa propia, nos comento también que hizo varias mejoras gracias a los créditos    otorgados por la Fundación Paraguaya. Este crédito lo destinara en compras de mercaderías como ropas de temporada, kepis, ropa interior, bermudas, etc.
texts.en:
Walbina is a long-standing client of our organization; she is married and has two adult children. She sells general merchandise and clothing from a stall on the corner of Estigarribía Municipal Route and Madame Lynch (better known as Last Street). It is very well situated because it is in an area of heavy foot traffic and, thanks to this, she has been in business for 30 years and has a good-sized regular customer base. She lives in the city of Capiata, 20 km away, from which she travels daily to tend to her stall. She owns her own home and tells us that she was able to do several improvements to it thanks to the loans granted by Fundación Paraguaya. These funds will be used to buy merchandise like: seasonal clothing, caps, underwear, bermuda shorts, etc.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy merchandise like short-sleeved shirts, underwear, bermuda shorts, caps, etc.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
El presente se encuentra en pleno desarrollo, en su cuarto ciclo y avanzando con caD. emprendimiento que caD. una realiza. Todas las madres luchas día a día para ayudar con los gastos de la casa y así logras una mejor condición de viD. para sus hijos.
Se puede hablar de la Sra. Carmen M. de 54 años , tiene 8 hijo que se queD. con la hermana mayor en la casa mientras ella se  va a vender sus  frutas por la calurosa zona del mercad de abasto. Por la tarde se dedica a la  venta de dulces y para ello  sale en compañía de su hijo menor .Ña Carmen es una señora muy sufriD. que tiene un día a día muy pesado  por que al llegar de su casa debe aguantar que el papa de sus hijos que vive de las bebidas venga a maltratarle a ella y a sus hijos.  
Tiene una casita  hecha de materiales precarias como pedazos de maderas y chapas. De esta manera ella sostiene a su familia, es una señora luchadora para sobre llevar con todos los gastos y también con su enfermedad.
texts.en:
The group is evolving with each undertaking and accomplishment, right now they are in their fourth advanced loan cycle. All of the mothers fight day by day to help with the costs of the home and this is how they achieve a better life for their children. Allow us to tell you about one member; Mrs. Carmen M., who is 54 years old and has eight children who stay with her older sister at home while she goes out to sell fruit in the hot area of the wholesale market. In the afternoon, she sells candy and is accompanied by her youngest son. Mrs. Carmen is a woman who has suffered and has a rough daily routine. When she returns home, she has to bear her husband, who is a drinker, and mistreats her and her children. She has a small house made of fragile materials like pieces of wood and scraps of metal or veneer. This is the way she supports her family and is a real fighter to be able to take on all the expenses even with her illness.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise, ingredients for meals to sell and tools to do their jobs.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Maria es socia del Banco Comunal “Gregoria A.” desde hace 1 año atrás, del distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 48 años de edad, es casada y tiene 6 hijos. Estudió primaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de maná.
Maria nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar maná y maíz.
Su sueño para el futuro es mejorar su alimentación y trabajar mejor con su negocio.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro.
texts.en:
Maria has been a member of the “Gregoria A.” cooperative bank for one year, in the Ilave district of the Collao province in Puno. She is 48 years old, married, and has 6 children. She completed her primary school education, and dedicates herself to the buying and selling of maná (marzipan-like candy dough). Maria tells us that with her first loan from the Manuela Ramos Movement of 500.00 Peruvian soles, she was able to increase her working capital. She will request a loan of 1,000.00 soles in order to buy maná and corn. Her dreams for the future include improving her food and her business. What she likes the most about working with her cooperative bank is being able to save money.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase mana and corn.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La señora Elsa es socia del Banco Comunal “Lupakas” desde hace 2 años atrás, del distrito de Pilcuyo, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 42 años de edad, es casada y tiene 5 hijos, de los cuales 4 viven con ella. Estudió primaria incompleta y se dedica a la venta de sogas.
Elsa nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado al Movimiento Manuela Ramos que fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles pudo aumentar su capital.
Ella solicitará un crédito de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles con el que podrá comprar hilos, lana y nylon.
Su sueño para el futuro es seguir trabajando y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y la puntualidad en las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
Elsa has been a member of the “Lupakas” cooperative bank for 2 years, in the Pilcuyo district of the province of El Collao, in Puno. She is 42 years old, married, and has 5 children, 4 of whom live with her. She did not complete her primary school education, and dedicates herself to the sale of rope. Elsa tells us that she used her first loan of 500.00 Peruvian soles from the Manuela Ramos Movement to increase her working capital. She will request a loan of 1,500.00 soles to buy threads, yarn and nylon. Her dreams for the future include continuing to work, and seeing her children become professionals. What she likes most about her cooperative bank is being punctual and the member meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase threads, yarn and nylon.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Add stock

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La señora Maria es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Juan”, en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 33 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Estudió primaria incompleta y se dedica a la  compra y venta de cereales.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 9 años atrás y su primer préstamo fue de  S/.300.00 nuevos soles el mismo que le sirvió para la compra de todos los productos como: chuño, cebada, arvejas.
Ella solicitará un préstamo de S/.1,500.00 nuevos soles con el que comprarà todos los productos necesarios para navidad.
Su deseo para el futuro es tener una casa en Yunguyo y Tacna.
Lo que màs le gusta de su organización es el ahorro y las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the “San Juan” cooperative bank, in the district and province of Yunguyo of Puno. She is 33 years old, married, and has 4 children. She did not complete her primary school education, and dedicates herself to the purchase and sale of cereals. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 9 years, and used her first loan of 300.00 Peruvian soles to buy: potato flour, barley and peas. She will request a loan of 1,500.00 soles to buy the necessary products for the Christmas holidays. Her wish for the future is to have a house in Yunguyo and Tacna. What she enjoys most about belonging to a cooperative bank are the savings and the member meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy panetones (fruit cakes), milk and chocolate.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
La señora Estela es socia del Banco Comunal “San Juan”, en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 46 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos. Estela no estudió y se dedica a la  compra y venta de cereales.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 4 meses atrás(reingresante) y su primer préstamo fue de S/.300.00 nuevos soles el mismo que le sirvió para incrementar su capital.
Ella solicitará un préstamo de S/.1,000.00 nuevos soles con el que comprarà chuño, cebada, arvejas y habas.
Su deseo para el futuro es tener una casa en Tacna y abrir una tienda.
Lo que màs le gusta de su organización es el ahorro.
texts.en:
Estela is a member of the “San Juan” cooperative bank, in the district and province of Yunguyo of Puno. She is 46 years old, and the single mother of 2 children. She has no formal education, and dedicates herself to the purchase and sale of cereals. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 4 months (rejoined), and used her first loan of 300.00 Peruvian soles to augment her working capital. She will request a loan of 1,000.00 soles to buy potato flour, barley, peas and beans. Her dreams for the future are to have a house in Tacna and to open a store. What she enjoys most about belonging to a cooperative bank is being able to save.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase potato flour, beans, barley and peas.

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.es:
La señora Valeriana es socia del Banco Comunal “San Juan”, en el distrito y provincia D. Yunguyo, departamento D. Puno. Ella tiene 60 años D. edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Valeriana no estudió y se dedica a la compra y venta D. ganado.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 10 años atrás y su primer préstamo fue D.  S/.300.00 nuevos soles el mismo que le sirvió para la compra D. dos ovejas criollas y un chancho.
Ella solicitará un préstamo D. S/.2,500.00 nuevos soles con los que comprarà dos vacas.
Su deseo para el futuro es vivir tranquila sin preocupaciones.
Lo que màs le gusta D. su organización es el ahorro y las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
Mrs. Valeriana is a member of the San Juan Community Bank in the District and Province of Yunguyo, Department of Puno. She 60 years old, married, and has four children. Valeriana did not attend school and works in the purchase and sale of livestock. She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for ten years and her first loan was for 300 PEN which allowed her to buy two Creole sheep and one pig. She is requesting a loan of 2,500 PEN with which she will buy two cows. Her wish for the future is to live a tranquil life without preoccupations. What she most likes about her organization are the savings and the meetings with the members.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Burke, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of two cows

loans.name: Elsa Vilma

texts.es:
La señora Elsa es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Juan”, en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 27 años de edad, es casada y tiene 1 hijo. Estudió primaria completa y se dedica a la compra y venta de gas.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 3 años atrás y su primer préstamo fue de  S/.300.00 nuevos soles el mismo que le sirvió para la compra de balones de gas.
Ella solicitará un préstamo de S/.1,000.00 nuevos soles con los que comprarà balones de gas, para que de esa manera pueda incrementar su mercadería y capital.
Su deseo para el futuro es tener una casa en Bolivia y a la vez una en Perú.
Lo que màs le gusta de su organización es el ahorro y la puntualidad que hay en cada reunión.
texts.en:
Mrs. Elsa is a member of the “San Juan” Community Bank, in the district and province of Yunguyo, in the department of Puno. She is 27 years old, is married and has one son. She has completed primary school, and she buys and sells gas. She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for three years. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, and it was used to buy canisters of gas. She is requesting a loan for 1000 PEN with which she will buy canisters of gas, so that she can increase her merchandise and capital. In the future, she wants to have a house in Bolivia and another in Perú. What she likes most about her organization are the savings and punctuality of each meeting.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy canisters of gas

loans.name: Marcia

texts.es:
La señora Marcia es socia del Banco Comunal “San Juan”, en el distrito y provincia D. Yunguyo, en el departamento D. Puno. Ella tiene 38 años D. edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos. Marcia no estudió y se dedica a la compra y venta D. ganado.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 5 años atrás y su primer préstamo fue D.  S/.300.00 nuevos soles el mismo que le sirvió para la compra D. ovejas.
Ella solicitará un préstamo D. S/.2,500.00 nuevos soles con los que comprarà una vaca.
Su deseo para el futuro es poder vivir tranquila.
Lo que màs le gusta D. su organización es el ahorro y las reuniones con las socias.
texts.en:
Marcia is a member of the Communal Bank "San Juan," in the district and province of Yunguyo, in the department of Puno. She is 38 years old, is married, and has three children. Marcia did not go to school. She buys and sells livestock.

She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for five years and her first loan was for 300 Soles, which she used to purchase sheep. She now seeks a loan of 2500 Soles with which she will buy one cow.

For the future, she wishes to live peacefully. What she likes most about the organization is the saving and the meetings with the other members.

Translated from Spanish by Michelle Harrison, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a cow

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La señora Margarita es socia del Banco Comunal “San Juan”, en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno. Ella tiene 37 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Estudió primaria completa y se dedica a la  venta de empanadas.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 1 año atrás (reingresante) y su primer préstamo fue de S/.100.00 nuevos soles el mismo que le sirvió para la compra de los ingredientes para la elaboraciòn de las empanadas.
Ella solicitará un préstamo de S/.500.00 nuevos soles con los que comprarà harina, manteca, etc.
Su deseo para el futuro es que sus hijos sean profesionales.
Lo que màs le gusta de su organización son las reuniones y la puntualidad con las socias.
texts.en:
Margarita is a member of the community bank "San Juan," in the district and province of Yunguyo, in the department of Puno. She is 37 years old, and is married with two children. She completed primary school and now works selling empanadas.



She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for one year (rejoined) and her first loan was for 100 Soles, which she used to purchase ingredients to make empanadas. She seeks a new loan of 500 Soles with which she will purchase flour, butter, etc.



Her wish for the future is that that her children can become working professionals. What she likes most about her organization are the meetings and the punctuality of the members.

Translated from Spanish by Michelle Harrison, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of flour and butter

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajando Juntas Group

texts.es:
.
